fields.name: 16oz (454g) Jarred Honey
fields.description:
Pure raw, unfiltered* honey extracted straight from our hives.
No added preservatives, chemicals, or sugar syrup - just the concentrated nectar and pollen as the bees made it. 

Store at room temperature, away from strong light. Clear honey may begin to crystallise if stored at low temperatures Should this happen, place the jar in a bowl of hot water (max 60°C) until the honey becomes clear again.

*Unfiltered is technically a misnomer, the honey is passed through a series of coarse and medium filters to remove bits of bees and other foreign particles, but isn't passed through a fine filter which would remove the pollen.
